description: Oats and sweet potato form the base of this healthier take on pizza.
name: Sweet Potato Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Place the potatoes in a large saucepan, cover with water and bring to the boil. Cook for 10 minutes until tender. Drain well and place in a large bowl. Roughly mash with a potato masher, add the oat flour and black pepper to taste. Mix well to form a dough ball.
Tip the dough onto a lightly greased baking sheet and shape into a thin pizza base. Set aside.

Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the onions for 5 minutes, add the garlic and oregano and cook for 2 minutes. Pour int he chopped tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes to thicken.
Spread the sauce on the pizza base and top with torn mozzarella. Bake for 15 minutes, until the cheese has meted and the base is lightly golden.
Drizzle pesto on the pizza and serve.
